title: Check for accuracy of depictions of each major historical figure in The Lost Dao
description:
The Lost Dao documents the intellectual history of Plurality.  It would be helpful to get feedback form experts on each of these figures to ensure accuracy.  Key figures include:

1. Henry George
2. Georg Simmel
3. John Dewey
4. Norbert Wiener
5. JCR Licklider
6. Ted Nelson
